fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Protect someone each night.
- Protect all Civilizations. (Costs 5 Gold)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Protecting someone grants Powerful defense to the target and all players within 2 houses of the target.
= Protecting all Civilizations grants each Civilization Invincible defense and, if they get hanged the next day, they will not die.
- Successfully protecting someone grants 3 gold for each attack.
- All Civilization abilities can bypass your protection.
- Passively generate 2 gold each night.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were strafed by an American fighter.” (Factional Kill)
“You were attacked but someone protected you!” (Target Attacked)
